sentences.translation: He is sprinkling water in the garden.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他轻轻地洒了香料在食物上，使菜肴的味道更加美味。
sentences.traditionalText: 他輕輕地灑了香料在食物上，使菜餚的味道更加美味。
sentences.pinyin: tā qīngqīng de sǎle xiāngliào zài shíwù shàng, shǐ càiyáo de wèidào gèngjiā měiwèi.
sentences.translation: He gently sprinkled spices on the food, making the dishes more delicious.

sentences.pinyin: Tā sǎ le yī dì de shuǐ.
sentences.translation: He spilled water all over the floor.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他不小心，洒出了手上的热咖啡，烫伤了自己。
sentences.traditionalText: 他不小心，灑出了手上的熱咖啡，燙傷了自己。
sentences.pinyin: Tā bù xiǎo xīn, sǎ chū le shǒu shàng de rè kā fēi, tàng shāng le zì jǐ.
sentences.translation: He was careless and spilled the hot coffee in his hand, scalding himself.
